summary.span: 指定 ASP.NET 动态数据如何显示数据字段以及如何设置数据字段的格式。

span.span: Specifies how data fields are displayed and formatted by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性应用到数据字段时，必须遵循的特性使用的指南。When you apply this attribute to a data field, you must follow the guidelines for the use of the attributes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据准则](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c563bbf3-feb9-484e-81d1-a585f1b0e192)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data Guidelines](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c563bbf3-feb9-484e-81d1-a585f1b0e192). ## Examples 请参阅此功能的在线示例：[运行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute)。See an online example of this feature: [Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute). 下面的示例演示如何使用以自定义格式设置为数据字段。The following example shows how to use the to customize formatting for a data field. 该示例执行以下步骤：The example performs the following steps: - 实现元数据的分部类和关联的元数据类。Implements a metadata partial class and an associated metadata class. - 在关联的元数据类中，它将应用特性来指定以下结果：In the associated metadata class, it applies the attribute to specify the following results: - 数据字段为空时显示的文本"[Null]"。Display the text "[Null]" when a data field is empty. - 区域设置特定货币格式显示货币数据。Display currency data in locale specific currency format. - 显示日期信息短格式 (mm/dd/yy)。Display date information in short format (mm/dd/yy). 此格式还适用于编辑模式。This format also applies in edit mode. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/CS/product.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/VB/product.vb#1)] 若要编译该示例，你需要以下各项：To compile the example, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更高版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关如何下载和安装 SQL Server 示例数据库的信息，请参阅[Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例： 数据库](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases)GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 请确保安装版本的正在运行的 SQL Server 示例数据库的正确版本。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 数据驱动的网站。A data-driven Web site. 这可用于创建数据库和包含要自定义的数据字段的类的数据上下文。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize. 有关详情，请参阅`Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`。For more information, see `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`.

summary.span: 获取或设置字段值的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display format for the field value.

value.span: 为数据字段的值指定显示格式的格式设置字符串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚无特殊格式设置应用于该字段值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的值中显示的自定义显示格式对象。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the object. 如果未设置属性、 字段的值显示没有任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). > [!NOTE] > 当属性是`true`，字段的值为 HTML 编码为其字符串表示形式，然后应用格式设置字符串。When the property is `true`, the value of the field is HTML encoded to its string representation before the formatting string is applied. 对于某些对象，如日期，你可能想要控制该对象使用的格式设置字符串的显示方式。For some objects, such as dates, you might want to control how the object is displayed with a formatting string. 在这些情况下，你必须设置属性`false`。In those cases, you must set the property to `false`. 默认情况下，格式设置字符串应用于该字段值仅当包含数据绑定控件时，才对象处于只读模式。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the object is in read-only mode. 若要应用于字段值的格式设置字符串，当它们处于编辑模式，设置属性`true`。To apply the formatting string to field values when they are in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 格式设置字符串可以是任意文本字符串，并且通常包含字段的值的占位符。The formatting string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式设置字符串"项值: {0}"，在中显示字符串时，字段的值替换 {0} 占位符对象。For example, in the formatting string "Item Value: {0}", the field's value is substituted for the {0} placeholder when the string is displayed in the object. 格式设置字符串的其余部分将显示为文本。The remainder of the formatting string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式设置的字符串未包含占位符，从数据源的字段的值不是包括在最终的显示文本。If the formatting string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来设置数据字段的显示格式。The following examples show how to use the property to set the display format of data fields. 第一个示例设置某一货币类型数据字段的显示格式。The first example sets the display format for a currency type data field. 第二个示例设置日期类型数据字段的显示格式。The second example sets the display format for a date type data field.
